summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correctness of various speech‑recognition decoding components in the NeMo ASR library, including RNNT alignment extraction, batched hypothesis handling, CTC greedy decoding, CUDA‑graph RNNT greedy decoding, and RNNT greedy/beam search decoders with alignment preservation.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and accurate decoding behavior for speech‑to‑text models, supporting robust deployment and maintenance of ASR services.
